UPDATE af_user_account_sence s JOIN (SELECT a.`user_id`, SUM(a.principle_amount) principle_amount FROM af_borrow_bill as a INNER JOIN af_borrow as b ON a.borrow_id=b.id INNER JOIN af_order as c ON b.order_id=c.id INNER JOIN af_trade_order as d ON c.id=d.order_id INNER JOIN af_trade_business_info as e ON d.business_id=e.business_id INNER JOIN af_business_type as f ON e.type=f.id WHERE a.is_delete=0 AND a.STATUS IN ( 'N','D') AND c.order_type = 'TRADE' AND f.`code` = 'TRAIN' AND a.`user_id` = #{userId} GROUP BY a.`user_id`) t on s.user_id = t.user_id and s.scene = 'TRAIN' set s.used_amount = IFNULL(t.principle_amount,0), s.gmt_modified = NOW() where s.scene = 'TRAIN' AND s.`user_id` = #{userId};

UPDATE af_user_account_sence s JOIN (SELECT a.`user_id`, SUM(a.principle_amount) principle_amount FROM af_borrow_bill as a INNER JOIN af_borrow as b ON a.borrow_id=b.id INNER JOIN af_order as c ON b.order_id=c.id WHERE a.is_delete=0 AND a.STATUS IN ( 'N','D') AND c.order_type <> 'TRADE' AND a.`user_id` = #{userId} GROUP BY a.`user_id`) t on s.user_id = t.user_id set s.used_amount = IFNULL(t.principle_amount,0), s.gmt_modified = NOW() where s.scene = 'ONLINE' AND s.`user_id` = #{userId};

UPDATE af_user_account_sence s JOIN (SELECT c.`user_id`, SUM(c.actual_amount) actual_amount from af_order c WHERE c.order_type = 'SELFSUPPORT' AND pay_type = 'AP' AND (`STATUS`='PAID' or `STATUS`='DELIVERED') and c.gmt_create >= '2018-01-05' and c.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY c.`user_id`) t on s.user_id = t.user_id set s.used_amount = s.used_amount + IFNULL(t.actual_amount,0), s.gmt_modified = NOW() where s.scene = 'ONLINE' AND s.`user_id` = #{userId};

UPDATE af_user_account_sence s JOIN (SELECT c.`user_id`, SUM(c.borrow_amount) borrow_amount from af_order c WHERE c.order_type = 'SELFSUPPORT' AND pay_type = 'CP' AND (`STATUS`='PAID' or `STATUS`='DELIVERED') and c.gmt_create >= '2018-01-05' and c.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY c.`user_id`) t on s.user_id = t.user_id set s.used_amount = s.used_amount + IFNULL(t.borrow_amount,0), s.gmt_modified = NOW() where s.scene = 'ONLINE' AND s.`user_id` = #{userId};
